import React, { Component } from "react"; import { connect } from "react-redux"; import { getProductsFromApi } from "../../Action/ProductActions.js"; import { Button, Checkbox, Icon, Table } from "semantic-ui-react"; class ProductContainer extends Component { componentDidMount() { this.props.getAllProducts(); } render() { return (

); } } const mapStateToProps = (state) => ({ products: state.products, }); const mapDispatchToProps = (dispatch) => ({ getAllProducts: () => dispatch(getProductsFromApi()), }); export default connect(mapStateToProps, mapDispatchToProps)(ProductContainer);
